data.title: Chaviva Gordon-Bennett on LinkedIn: I have the best news ever, dear LinkedIn readers. I'm utterly stoked toâ€¦
data.meta_description: I have the best news ever, dear LinkedIn readers. I'm utterly stoked to announce that I am funemployed! Yes, I'm eagerly prioritizing rest, recharging, andâ€¦ | 21 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
ğŸ””Life Update. Long post alert.ğŸ”” I'm sure some of you have been wondering why you haven't heard or seen anything from me this week? Well, Monday morning I heard the words that I've honestly never heard before..."I have to let you go, you're just not a fit"! My mind went numb, my heart broke and the anxiety was in full momentum!!! It was so out of the blue, I don't even have the words still, to fully convey all that has been going on this week. Maybe, a good way to describe it is emotional and mental whiplash. Having everything taken from you in a moment is something I have been more than acquainted with the last few years. (in life in general) Honestly, I thought I had finally found the place that would last for years, a place that would truly value all that I bring to the table?ğŸ¥º Sure, there was a huge learning curve and mistakes were made, there is absolutely no way around that in a new role. I'm doing my best to take the "high road" in all of this. My mind reels with questions, thoughts and emotions. When you put 110% into everything you do and everyone you meet, things like this hurt at a very deep level! ğŸ’” Hopefully, you know that I am not trying bad mouth anyone, but I have always been #aunthentic and #honest with everyone here and I couldnâ€™t not share about whatâ€™s going on now with my #linkeinfamily. I truly have no idea what is next? Right now (if you want the raw and real truth) I have no strength to start again...but I am thankful for #family and #friends who have been encouraging, loving and lifting me up during this time. Thank you, it is appreciated more than you know! ğŸ«‚ğŸ’šğŸ˜Š Stay tuned for updates. Thereâ€™s a season for everything. #nextchapter P.S. If you know of an open role that may be a good fit? Send it my way. ğŸ™‹ğŸ»â™€ï¸ #marketing #events #promoter #socialmediamanager #contentcreation #relationships #community #connector #wichitakansas #openforwork

Hey LinkedIn fam! ğŸ‘‹ Today, I want to talk about the incredible impact we can make by spreading positive thoughts.ğŸŒ¼ In a world that can sometimes feel overwhelming, a simple positive thought has the power to uplift, inspire, and create a ripple effect of goodness.ğŸŒ¼ Whether it's through a kind word, an encouraging message, or sharing inspiring content, let's make a conscious effort to spread positivity in our professional lives.ğŸŒ¼ By spreading positive thoughts, we create a supportive and inclusive environment where everyone can thrive. It can boost morale, foster collaboration, and bring out the best in ourselves and others.ğŸŒ¼ So, let's make it a habit to share positive thoughts, celebrate achievements, and uplift one another. Together, we can create a brighter, more empowering professional community.ğŸŒ¼ âœ¨Share in the comments how you spread positivity in your professional life. Let's inspire each other and make a positive difference! âœ¨ p.s summers are already here I love to have watermelon ğŸ‰ mojitos let me know what is your fav summer cooler drinks?? #SpreadPositivity #PositiveThoughts #ProfessionalCommunity #OpenToWork #WritersLife

Today, I wanted to share a bit of positivity and inspiration as we continue on our professional journeys. ğŸš€ In this rapidly evolving world, change is the only constant. And you know what? That's something to be excited about! ğŸ’ªğŸ’¼ Every challenge we face, every hurdle we overcome, paves the way for growth and learning. ğŸŒ±âœ¨ Remember, every setback is a setup for a comeback, and every closed door leads us closer to the right open door. ğŸšªğŸ”‘ Let's celebrate our resilience, adaptability, and unwavering determination to succeed. ğŸ‰ Let's keep our focus on the bright horizon ahead. ğŸŒ… Together, we are a community of innovators, creators, and go-getters. By supporting one another and sharing our insights, we're making waves of positive change in our industries. ğŸŒŠ So, here's to chasing our dreams, uplifting each other, and embracing the adventure that each day brings. Let's go out there and make a difference! ğŸ’¼âœ¨ Feel free to connect with me if you're looking to collaborate, share ideas, or just have a virtual coffee chat. â˜• Together, we can achieve great things! #PositiveVibes #NewOpportunities #GrowthMindset #SuccessAhead #CommunityMatters

All things tech to telling stories The elusive algo to ADHD. From minority and majority opinions Unsung heros to influencers. Corporates types to creatives. Going deep on mindset or musings. I am continually fascinated by what posts catch traction. I think it speaks to what we really care about as humans. I am certainly no influencer but this was interesting to me. For a couple months I have been posting daily, some HUB International company content (well designed) and targeted. Some random post or reposts that catch my attention but overall last week 3 post had the most impressions: 1. Being real about how we feel seems to resonate. I think it might happen unconsciously. We all have struggles, some obvious but most are not. 2. Helping others find happiness. Looking for a job is stressful and having an open roll in your company is more work for you until it is filled. Asking for help made this post spread quickly. It reminded me that I have great friends as well as how much humans do want to help each other. Just ask. 3. Real life events. People love sports and small peaks into others lives. Not sure why but when itâ€™s real, it resonates. Lesson = be real and be human. It will attract attention.

Hey there, amazing community! ğŸŒŸ I recently read a post that spoke to me. It suggested that people write not just to be liked, but to be seen. It struck me how much we all crave to be acknowledged and valued. This inspired me to open up and share this post with you all. ğŸ’– I have a two-part invitation for you: Firstly, let's connect more! Instead of just scrolling past a post and liking it, let's use the hashtag #HeyThereISeeYou and leave a comment. Especially on posts with a green banner, let's take a moment to show some love and support. Together, we can create such an uplifting and positive space. ğŸŒˆ Secondly, I know how draining the job search process can be. It's tough out there! That's why, starting this Thursday, I'll share one valuable thing I learned during my job search. My aim is to make it more empowering and offer better support to help you keep going. I encourage you to join in too! You have grown so much, and one thing is certain - it will only increase your gratitude for your journey. Use the hashtag #EnjoyableJobSearchLearning and transform our experiences into something positive. Can we come together and make this a reality? ğŸš€ I'm rooting for you! #DevelopersCommunity #PositiveVibes #SupportEachOther #InspireAndBeInspired

Hello LinkedIn family, I hope this post finds you all in high spirits! As we navigate through our professional journeys, it's the connections we make along the way that truly enrich our lives. Today, I want to take a moment to extend a warm welcome to all my new connections and to celebrate the cherished friends who have been a part of my journey for a while now. ğŸ”¹ To My New Connections: I'm delighted to connect with each of you. Whether we've crossed paths through shared interests, mutual connections, or a common passion for growth, I'm excited about the potential collaborations, insights, and knowledge sharing that lie ahead. Let's embark on this journey of professional growth and learning together. ğŸ”¹ To My Dear Friends: Your presence on this platform and in my life has been a source of inspiration and encouragement. From shared successes to supporting each other during challenges, our journey together is a testament to the power of genuine connections. Thank you for being a part of my network and for your unwavering support. ğŸ”¹ Let's Connect Further: Whether you're a new connection or a familiar face, I look forward to learning more about your experiences, insights, and aspirations. Let's engage in meaningful conversations, exchange ideas, and continue to uplift and empower one another. ğŸ”¹ Sharing is Caring: If there's a recent accomplishment, project, or professional milestone you'd like to share, please feel free to comment below. Let's celebrate each other's achievements and create a positive, collaborative space right here on LinkedIn. Thank you for being a part of my journey, both old and new connections. Here's to building bridges, fostering growth, and making lasting memories together. ğŸ¥‚ #NewConnections #LinkedInCommunity #ProfessionalJourney #BuildingRelationships

I'm often asked about my 'I made it moment' in social media and when I knew I wanted to pursue this career full-time. To be honest, there wasn't a single, defining moment. Every day, I'm still discovering new aspects of this dynamic field, which keeps me motivated and eager to learn more. That's why I'm hereâ€” not only to share my journey but also to learn from the experiences of others. Each story has its unique insights and strategies, and I believe we can all benefit from sharing them. Did you have a pivotal moment in your career when everything clicked? Iâ€™d love to hear about your experiences and what lessons youâ€™ve drawn from them. Please share your stories in the comments below! #BrookeMonk #SocialMedia #ContentCreator
